content: thumb slip the 17 sts back onto the needles knit the stitches and pick up and knit 3 sts from the gap behind the thumb gusset you will now have 20 sts join to work in round knit 24 rounds or as many as you need next round k2tog to the end next round k2tog to the end thread yarn through remaining stitches falling leaves gloves © sara öhman 6 charts chart a chart b falling leaves gloves © sara öhman 7
